design.title: Design
design.description: It all begins here, the sketches on paper, an idea taking shape, concepts and prototyping, where creativity flows, and we project a faithful glimpse of what the final work will be.

code.title: Code
code.description: The actual construction of what has been designed, creating components, states, meticulous performance management to achieve a flawless and easily maintainable end product, whether it's a complete system or just a new feature.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: An excellent way to enhance existing knowledge is by teaching. I always seek to share the knowledge acquired over the years. Being experienced in the field goes far beyond hard skills.
